alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 07 at 10:40PM AKDT until August 09 at 7:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKDT TUESDAY... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a High Surf Advisory, which is in effect until 7 AM AKDT Tuesday. * LOCATION...Yukon Delta Coast. * TIMING...Until 7 am Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Beach erosion will occur. Belongings left on the beach may wash away. Logs and debris will wash up on to the beach. * WAVE AND SURF...West to northwest winds 15 to 25 mph will be increasing tonight to 20 to 35 mph with high surf developing through the evening and continuing into Monday night before winds diminish.
info.instruction: A High Surf Advisory means that localized beach erosion is expected. Precautions should be taken to protect property.
